Copycat API Reference (0.6.0)

High-level resource API 
Package Description
net.kuujo.copycat
Copycat is a cluster coordination framework built on a Raft distributed log.
Distributed resources 
Package Description
net.kuujo.copycat.atomic
Provides distributed atomic variables such as DistributedAtomicValue.
net.kuujo.copycat.collections
Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap and DistributedSet.
net.kuujo.copycat.coordination
Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedLeaderElection and DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.
I/O & Serialization 
Package Description
net.kuujo.copycat.io
Provides a low-level Buffer abstraction backed by on- or off-heap memory, memory mapped files, or RandomAccessFile.
net.kuujo.copycat.io.serializer
Provides a fast serialization framework built on the Buffer abstraction.
net.kuujo.copycat.io.storage
Provides a standalone segmented log for Copycat's Raft implementation.
net.kuujo.copycat.io.transport
The Transport layer provides a low-level interface via which Copycat clients and servers communicate.
net.kuujo.copycat.io.util
Provides interfaces for performing low-level on- and off-heap memory management.
Raft Consensus Algorithm 
Package Description
net.kuujo.copycat.raft
Provides base interfaces for Copycat's implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm.
net.kuujo.copycat.raft.client
Provides lightweight, feature complete Raft client.
net.kuujo.copycat.raft.protocol
The protocol layer provides a set of interfaces for communicating between Raft clients and servers in a Raft cluster.
net.kuujo.copycat.raft.server
Provides a feature complete implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm.
Miscellaneous 
Package Description
net.kuujo.copycat.util
Generic utilities for managing object lifecycles.
net.kuujo.copycat.util.concurrent
Utilities for thread management and asynchronous workflows.
